title: Help me find myself
brief_description: Gerard Kennedy explains cerebral palsy, of which spasticity is one form. The film shows children and adults utilising their abilities to lead as normal a life as possible.
description: Gerard Kennedy explains cerebral palsy, of which spasticity is one form. The film shows children and adults utilising their abilities to lead as normal a life as possible.
